name: Planetary Escape
description:
Earth is dying, there is nothing more that can be done,
Its time to move on... to a different planet!
you must grab your motorcycle and get to the plane,
and then with the plane, you must get to the space ship!
Good luck!

This game was made for the "Beginners Circle Jam #3"
with theme "A Different Planet"

This game was made with open source software:

Game Engine: ct.js
Graphics: InkScape

SoundFX and Music taken from FreeSound.org
